<h3 id="X15829">X(15829)&nbsp;=&nbsp;CENTER OF THE TANGENTIAL PERSPECONIC OF THESE TRIANGLES: ABC AND EXCENTERS-REFLECTIONS</h3>
Barycentrics &nbsp;&nbsp; a*(-a+b+c)*(a^2-2*(b+c)*a+2*b*c-3*c^2-3*b^2)  :  :
<br>
<b>X(15829) = 3*X(936)-2*X(9709) = 3*X(1706)-4*X(9709)</b>
<p>X(15829) lies on these lines: {1,6}, {2,3340}, {3,7971}, {5,3577}, {8,3452}, {10,3090}, {21,13384}, {40,997}, {46,3899}, {56,3928}, {57,3869}, {63,1420}, {65,5437}, {78,1697}, {84,5887}, {144,4308}, {145,3984}, {188,11534}, {200,2136}, {210,2098}, {236,11535}, {329,10106}, {390,12437}, {404,5128}, {474,2093}, {497,6737}, {515,5811}, {517,936}, {519,1058}, {527,3600}, {551,12559}, {758,3333}, {908,9578}, {944,12572}, {946,6843}, {1125,11529}, {1201,3677}, {1265,4901}, {1329,3679}, {1376,7991}, {1482,5044}, {1698,5443}, {1699,5794}, {2478,5727}, {2550,4301}, {2646,4512}, {2801,9845}, {2886,11522}, {2975,3929}, {3035,9588}, {3036,12653}, {3038,13541}, {3059,10866}, {3185,10882}, {3189,12575}, {3304,3962}, {3419,9614}, {3476,12527}, {3485,5665}, {3576,5267}, {3601,4511}, {3616,5745}, {3617,5328}, {3622,5273}, {3626,11525}, {3671,6173}, {3711,3893}, {3740,11224}, {3811,3884}, {3870,3890}, {3880,4882}, {3895,4420}, {3913,9819}, {3940,6765}, {4297,5698}, {4342,6743}, {4640,7987}, {4662,4915}, {4679,10950}, {5087,7989}, {5219,10585}, {5231,11376}, {5534,7966}, {5657,6700}, {5705,5886}, {5777,12650}, {5784,9856}, {5791,5901}, {5836,8580}, {5853,9785}, {5881,12116}, {6001,9841}, {6049,6172}, {6282,12672}, {7028,11899}, {7322,10459}, {9579,11415}, {9848,15733}, {12563,15841}</p>
<p>
X(15829) = reflection of X(1706) in X(936)<br>
X(15829) = X(15811) of excenters-reflections triangle<br>X(15829) = {X(i),X(j)}-harmonic conjugate of X(k) for these (i,j,k): (1, 72, 6762), (1, 960, 9), (1, 5223, 12513), (1, 11523, 3243), (2, 11682, 3340), (8, 7962, 3680), (37, 15479, 9), (40, 997, 5438), (56, 12526, 3928), (65, 8583, 5437), (78, 1697, 3158), (78, 3877, 1697), (392, 5730, 1), (960, 5289, 1), (997, 3878, 40)<br></p>
